pageContext.claim: “I remember Martha Raddatz, oh, oh, oh. She's very impartial. She was another one of my debate anchors. I had some real beauties, didn't they? She was, she was crying and they all said we're going to do badly with women. I'm going to get terribly with women.”
pageContext.analysis: ABC News and Martha Raddatz both denied that she cried or “choked up” on election night in 2016.
